name: User tries to add new Credit Card to wallet
description: User tries to add new Credit Card to wallet
descriptionHtml: User tries to add new Credit Card to wallet

testStage.description: User tries to add new Credit Card to wallet

steps.name: I check that the Saucelabs session is preserved

parameters.name: userProfile
parameters.value: {PHONE_NUMBER=780780000, EMAIL=jan.kowalski@gmaptest.com, PASSWORD=#Test123, PHONE_COUNTRY_PREFIX=+48, FIRST_NAME=Jan, BUSINESS_UNIT=SE, OTP=000000, LAST_NAME=Kowalski, PHONE_COUNTRY=Poland}

steps.name: I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Wallet Screen" is displayed
I check the number of "CREDIT CARDS" added
I check that the "Add Payment Method Pane" is displayed
I check that the "Card successfully added" toast message is displayed
I wait for the "CREDIT CARD" list to have more or equal than 1 elements
I check the number of "CREDIT CARDS" added
I check that the actual value: "1" is greater than value "0"

labels.name: parentSuite
labels.value: GMAP EU Mobile Test Automation - [ANDROID PARALLEL XML SUITE]
